item.title: Learn Html Css and Javascript at Zero Cost
item.description: Photo by Social.Cut on Unsplash. The web we see is built using 3 technologies: HTML CSS JavaScript In this article I’ll be sharing some of the GREAT and FREE resources for learning all the three technologies. This material will contain TEXT and VIDEOS. The most important things you have to do: Implement anything you learn. Glue different parts and make new websites. Experiment (MOST IMPORTANT). 1.
